thread.section_title: Alpha Flight Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Alpha Flight Guru | alphaflightguru.com
thread.title: Peggy
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Peggy

author: Peggy
title: Peggy
text:
My first experience was frustrating. I travel with a small dog in the cabin, the agent forgot to add her to my flight record and had to be reminded more than once. He also made my two connecting flights on separate records, I was forced to collect my luggage and transfer it to the next flight,
going through security again and almost missing my transatlantic flight.
I received no miles from the airline for that flight.
I decided to give it another try, and this time all worked smoothly. I am not saving as much money this time, but have exactly the flights I preferred, with my dog, and am to receive miles for the transatlantic flight.
